title: Odion Ighalo - Wikipedia
snippet: On 31 January 2017, Ighalo joined Chinese Super League club Changchun Yatai for a reported Â£20 million. He ranked second in the scoring charts in his second season at 21, but his team suffered relegation. Ighalo transferred to Shanghai Shenhua on 14 February 2019.

title: Odion Ighalo - Nigeria | Player Profile | Sky Sports Football
snippet: Odion Ighalo, who was on loan at Manchester United for a year, has completed a permanent transfer to Saudi Arabian club Al-Shabab.
